content: My 10yo daughter is sleepless tonight (wonder where she gets that from :sweat_smile: ) ...she spent some time on her mobile, but after 10:30pm it is automatically locked. ...then she watched some TV, then she started drawing elves ...and now she just came to ask me for ides on what to do next ...I had nothing, so she went away for a min, then came back and asked me "how do you spell Backdrop?" ...I have absolutely no idea what she's up to :sweat_smile:
